docs.title: Example Blog Post
docs.text: This is a demo blog post. You can add code, images, and anything else here.

docs.title: Motivating the average developer to engage in DevSecOps
docs.text: In this engaging lecture, we'll explore how everyday developers can dive into the world of secure development operations. Through hands-on activities, we'll unveil the simplicity of creating vulnerabilities in Docker. Get ready for a practical journey that will empower you to strengthen your software security skills and become a vital part of the DevSecOps movement!
